//Admin Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer Admin admin@gmail.com Navigation header Home About Us Edit Profile Log Out We organize this Persona Blood Donation hospital is to help the patients who need of surgery, cancer treatment and transfusions for blood loss from traumatic injuries. The main purpose is to ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages. Currently, we have created this mobile app for the blood donor to donate their blood. Blood donor can easily make their appointment through this app. Blood donor will also receive many blood donation appointment from this app. It will only shown the blood type request that is suitable for the blood donor.
